title: Oma's Gazpacho
markdown:
### Summary

Nathan,

Oma Dianne has some of the best recipes! When she decided to move from her home into assisted living she allowed me to have her recipe cards. I have not made all of them but I can almost guarantee they are the best. Just like you and your soon to be little brother. I love you dearly.

Mom

### Ingredients

* 6 to 8 ripe tomatoes
* 1 to 2 cups of cold water with ice cubes
* ⅓ to ½ onion
* ½ green pepper
* ⅓ to ¾ cucumber
* 1 to 2 cloves garlic
* ⅓ to ½ cup olive oil
* ⅓ to ½ c sherry vinegar
* 1 ½ Tbs salt
* 1 tsp sugar
### Preparation

* Finely diced onion, pepper, cucumber, tomato, and garlic in pieces
* Combine oil, vinegar, salt, and sugar in measuring cup and stir
* Place veg and vinegar oil mix in blender until all veg is pureed serve chilled
